model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
        favouriteThing Thing[] // Despite the new field - there is no change to the database for a has-many relation.
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

=== 

[]
